title: The Retro Terminal
prompt_text: A vector die-cut sticker of a vintage bulky computer monitor displaying green command line text. Flat design, thick bold black outlines, simple shading. 90s tech nostalgia aesthetic. Wide white border, isolated on a pure white background.
remix_tip: Change 'green command line text' to 'a pixelated heart' or 'a sad face'.

title: Cyberpunk Neko
prompt_text: A die-cut sticker of a cyberpunk cat head wearing high-tech neon goggles. Vector illustration, vibrant purple and cyan colors, flat style, bold graphic lines. Minimalist shading. Thick white contour, isolated on white background.

title: Developer's Fuel
prompt_text: A vector sticker of a takeaway coffee cup with a 'Java' logo on the sleeve. Steam rising in a stylized swirl. Flat colors, warm brown and orange tones. Thick black outline, 2D vector art. Die-cut with a white border, white background.
remix_tip: Change 'coffee cup' to 'energy drink can' or 'bubble tea'.

title: The Glitch Ghost
prompt_text: A cute cartoon ghost character slightly glitching with pixelated edges. Turquoise and pink color palette. Vector art, flat design, thick bold outlines. Die-cut sticker style with a wide white border, isolated on white background.

title: Pixel Heart
prompt_text: A vibrant red pixel-art heart with a shiny highlight. 8-bit retro gaming style. Vector illustration, sharp edges, bold black outline. Die-cut sticker format, white border, isolated on white background.

title: Cyberpunk Cat
prompt_text: High-quality vector die-cut sticker of a cyberpunk cat wearing neon goggles and a tech jacket, bold thick black outlines, flat vector colors, minimal shading, pop-culture sci-fi style, clean white background, centered composition, sticker-ready, no text, no gradients
remix_tip: Change cat to dog or raccoon or other animal.

title: AI Brain Power
prompt_text: High-quality vector die-cut sticker of a glowing artificial intelligence brain with circuit patterns and lightning bolts, bold thick outlines, flat vector colors, simple shading, tech-inspired illustration, white background, clean edges, sticker design
remix_tip: Change lightning bolts to data streams or neurons.

title: Retro Robot Buddy
prompt_text: High-quality vector die-cut sticker of a cute retro robot with antenna and screen face, bold thick outlines, flat vector colors, minimal shading, playful pop-tech style, white background, centered, printable sticker
remix_tip: Make robot angry or futuristic or more humanoid.

title: Hacker Frog
prompt_text: High-quality vector die-cut sticker of a frog in a hoodie typing on a laptop, bold thick outlines, flat vector colors, simple shading, internet meme style, white background, sticker-ready
remix_tip: Swap frog for cat or owl or other animal.

title: Pixel Astronaut
prompt_text: High-quality vector die-cut sticker of an astronaut holding a pixelated planet, bold thick outlines, flat vector colors, simple shading, pop-culture space theme, white background, clean sticker cut
remix_tip: Change planet to a moon or cube or star.
